title: Lahcen Ouadani
text: Lahcen Ouadani (born 14 July 1959) is a <a href="Morocco">Moroccan</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played for <a href="Morocco%20national%20football%20team">Morocco</a> in the <a href="1986%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1986 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="FAR%20Rabat">FAR Rabat</a>.
